mapper.select: SELECT r.RESERVATION_NO AS reservationNo, TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reservationDate, TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS reservationTime, t.TABLE_NO AS tableNo FROM RESERVATION r LEFT JOIN TABLE_RESERVATION t ON r.RESERVATION_NO = t.RESERVATION_NO WHERE r.USERS_ID = #{usersId} AND TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} AND TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'MM') = #{month} AND r.RESERVATION_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY r.RESERVATION_DATE DESC

SELECT r.RESERVATION_NO AS reservationNo, TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reservationDate, TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS reservationTime, lr.LUNCHBOX_DETAILS AS lunchBoxDetails FROM RESERVATION r LEFT JOIN LUNCHBOX_RESERVATION lr ON r.RESERVATION_NO = lr.RESERVATION_NO WHERE r.USERS_ID = #{usersId} AND TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} AND TO_CHAR(r.RESERVATION_DATE, 'MM') = #{month} AND r.RESERVATION_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY r.RESERVATION_DATE DESC
